sections.title: Function

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section does not contain diagrams; it's not relevant to evaluate diagram formatting.
The section's focus is on textual content about ATF1's function; there's no use of diagrams to warrant a suggestion for expansion.

sections.meta_notes: This content-rich section details the role of ATF1 in transcriptional regulation and its implications in diseases, particularly cancer, without involving diagrams or visual content.
